name: findadoc-server
description: Backend for Find a Doc, Japan

scripts.dev: echo '🧶 Installing yarn dependencies...🧶' && yarn && yarn generate && yarn dev:startserver
scripts.dev:startserver: echo '💻 💻 💻✨ Starting dev server...' && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec 'node --inspect --loader ts-node/esm src/index.ts'
scripts.test: echo '🧶 Installing yarn dependencies...🧶' && yarn && vitest
scripts.build: echo 'ⓘ Note ⓘ: This build is intended for production, not dev' && yarn prod:build
scripts.prod:build: echo '🧶 Installing yarn dependencies...🧶' && cross-env NODE_ENV=production && yarn --immutable-cache --check-cache && echo '🧹 cleaning dist folder...' && yarn dlx rimraf dist/ && echo '➡ ➡ copying files...' && yarn dlx copyfiles -a -V src/typeDefs/schema.graphql .env.prod dist && echo '💻✨ compiling code..' && tsc && echo '💻✨ successfully built!'
scripts.prod:startserver: echo '💻 💻 💻✨ Starting prod server...' && cross-env NODE_ENV=production PIDUSAGE_USE_PS=true pm2 start dist/src/index.js --no-daemon && pm2 logs --lines 100
scripts.prod:stopserver: echo '💻 💻 💻✨ Stopping prod server...' && pm2 stop all && pm2 delete all
scripts.prod:dockerstart: echo '🐳 🐳 🐳✨ Running docker compose...' && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose-api.yml up -d --build --remove-orphans --force-recreate
scripts.prod:dockerstop: echo '🐳 🐳 🐳✨ Stopping docker compose...' && docker compose -f docker/docker-compose-api.yml down
scripts.generate: echo '➡ ➡ ➡ Generating types from graphql schema ➡ ➡ ➡' && graphql-codegen --config ./typesgeneratorconfig.ts

author: Find a Doc, Japan
